name: Agent Mango
description: DeFi agent suite: MangoSwap (token swaps on Base via Uniswap V3/Aerodrome) and Spraay (multi-chain batch payments). Both registered as ERC-8004 agents on Ethereum mainnet.

skills.name: Token Swap
skills.description: Swap tokens on Base network via Uniswap V3 and Aerodrome routing. Gas-free via Coinbase Paymaster.
examples: Swap 100 USDC for ETH on Base
What's the best route for USDC to DEGEN?

skills.name: DCA Schedule
skills.description: Set up dollar-cost averaging schedules for token purchases on Base.
examples: Schedule daily buys of DEGEN with USDC

skills.name: Batch Payment
skills.description: Send payments to multiple recipients in a single transaction across Base, Bittensor, Unichain, Plasma, and BOB networks.
examples: Send 10 USDC each to 5 addresses on Base
Batch payment of TAO to 3 wallets on Bittensor

skills.name: x402 Paid API
skills.description: Access Spraay's x402 payment gateway endpoints. 9 paid endpoints for AI agent micropayments on Base mainnet.
examples: Query Spraay x402 gateway for batch payment pricing
